entity

类 SaverAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Account
      • entity.SaverAccount
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SaverAccount
extends Account

    Title: SaverAccount

    Description: a subclass of Accout, which requires setting a specific notice date and only allowed to withdrawal money after a date

    作者:
    Yujie Yang
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • SaverAccount

        public SaverAccount(java.lang.String pin,
                    Customer c,
                    java.util.Date d)

        Title:SaverAccount

        Description:constructor of the SaverAccount

        参数:
        pin - account password set by customer who firstly create the account
        c - specific customer who owns this account
        d - a minimum notice date before any withdrawal can be given

      • checkInterval

        public long checkInterval()
                   throws java.text.ParseException

        Title: checkInterval

        Description: check is the time allowed to withdrawal money

        返回:
        the day between current time and the notice date
        抛出:
        java.text.ParseException

      • addWithdrawal

        public void addWithdrawal(double i)
        从类复制的说明: Account

        Title: addWithdrawal

        Description: Add withdrawal record into this account only when

        指定者:
        addWithdrawal 在类中 Account
        参数:
        i - the amount of money customer want to withdrawal
